notes.text: Had to be the easiest and definitely the fastest kog using this deck, forbidding chalice was the mvp with so many sylvans in legend, i tried other decks and just kept getting tilted from leg 3 back to leg 1 so i decided to try mask heros and i went 14-1 with them and the one game i lost was due to me bricking with a opening hand of all spells, every duel was a fairly easy duel the hardest duel i had was against the new geargia deck jus cuz they kept destroying my cards but my top deck draws were better than his so he jus surrendered
